column3: â€œThis is one of the best strain i ever tryğŸ˜± you feel so quiet and happy at the same time, you feel what to do things like cook, dance you feel like u want investigate something lol, the flavor is like tropical fruits, like orange, watermelon lol, 5 star to this strain!!!â€
â€œLove this strain yo it feels like the best high in my opinionâ€
â€œthis is some good stuff , iv had better but this strain is well get you the munches big timeâ€

â€œQuick burn and earthy flavor had me worried at first, but effects were top notch. Pleased to see it so highly rated in positive effects and low on negatives. If the flavor was as sweet as the bouquet, this could be my favorite, but certainly in top 10 as it stands.â€
â€œThis strain is perfect on a lonely night, it gives you that uplifting high.â€
â€œnothing special. no big kick. actually took more hits than normalâ€

â€œThis Strain is just like its name! Its loud asf and it feels like your in a dream. Makes you very happy very focused also had a strong tingly feeling and makes you focus.This is a hood strain for HDHD because it makes you focus and good for depression because it makes you happy (i have neither of which)â€
â€œReally good strain. Tastes and gives a good high. Would recommend.â€

â€œDefinitely has me upbeat. Great for smoking with a group or in a party/going out setting. I get why some people are saying it leaves you paranoid, but I think it's just a feeling of excitement the bud gives you. The taste is decent and the actual smoking of it is very smooth. Won't have you coughing a lot.â€
â€œI just smoked a gram of this and I'm stuck, quiet, not hungry, tired, very relaxed, no dry mouth, something you smoke by yourself.â€

â€œLoud exudes a strangely unique aroma, and produces an energetic, thoughtful high. My mind felt refreshed as it was flooded with positive ideas and emotions. It is not a strain that would completely knock someone off their feet -- mild, 'barely-there' body high.â€
â€œâ€

â€œBeing a fan of Blue Dream and its pain killer abilities, Loud Dream steps it up a notch! Great hybrid mid day smoke. Relaxing but keeps you focused. Fabulous for MS pain. I enjoy this strain so much, I keep it on hand.â€
â€œGreat daytime smoke, very uplifting and nice not-too-heavy high. Harsh smoke but worth it. Nice strain.â€
â€œI won't lie to u did had me frost but I didn't yield that much which was my fault so don't let me stop u from growing itâ€
â€œThis is is some solid on the budged or deal shoppers kinda tree right here. A decent daily medicine.â€

â€œGreat strain, makes you feel relaxed but focused gives you a good boost throughout the day really controllable, the only thing that I didn't like about it was the fact that it took me more hits then usual to get lifted.â€
â€œgood taste good highâ€
â€œAmazingâ€

â€œFun, up beat high. Very social buzz that kicks in pretty quick and lasts for a few hrs as it mellows out into the munchies and a good movie to fall asleep to. Just woke up and there is food everywhere and I really dont remember passing out. Strong B+, not enough indica feeling for my pain relief needs, but great bud for a little kick back or hiking, versatile medicine for meâ€

â€œWith Hairs like Mufassa, the Dream is a plush and full nugget. The crystals aren't as abundant as some prefer, but the immediate taste and aroma compensates by far. A great relaxer that helped wit my back pain as well as my anxiety.  Look forward to a thoughtful Euphoric high that compliments the unique looking furry budâ€
â€œYo this LOUD!!!! makes you crave 7 Select barbeque chipsâ€
â€œVery creative uplifting mood recommend a bicycle or somethingâ€
â€œTHIS STRAIN IS A LEGEND. It will sweep you off your feet and have you walking funny for 2 hours! Mix it with reggo for more taste.â€
â€œGreat for pain relief. Excellent medical strain as well as recreational! Nice and relaxing with a perfect amount of mental stimulation.â€
â€œVery paranoia ish bicycle recommended definitely recommend walking or recreational activitysâ€
â€œLoud dream is great for days u want 2 get things done. Awesome b4 a workout.Better than blue dream.â€
â€œgood taste good highâ€
â€œI enjoy this strain's quick up take and long Mellow high, for me this is One Hit Shit".  These buds remind me a lot of the stuff I used to get back in my younger days.â€"
â€œLOUD AND CLEARâ€

â€œI think this strain is awesome. what an awesome bud this is for creativity, relaxation, playing music and a very good head high. when listening to music with this strain, you feel like the individual notes are mini roller coaster rides LOL to me it intensifies everything from what you hear to even something simple as the rain droplets during a rainstorm. after about a half hour to an hour, those Munchies will kick in...â€
â€œI really enjoy it, keeps me focused and relaxed.â€

â€œThis is my desperate last resort weed because i wouldnt be able to get anything else reason why is friend of mine has QPs of the stuff on hand, his favorite strain. It def gets the job done. A more clear headed high yet very introverted, just very mild effects, overall no pain real pain relief but does give energy and and stimulated appetite.â€

â€œJust an 8ter of this today to be thrifty but to my surprise this strain is FIRE!!! I am a smokers smoker and will smoke less quality sometimes just to make it through the week ...This is not that type of deal! Great strains from Boss Bud Alwaysâ€

â€œPowerful. One hit of dry herb off a vaping pen, and within seconds, it hit the frontal lobe. That one hit lasted, more than four hours, strongly. I was immediately relaxed and let the tingling in my forehead rock me with my pulse. For my shell-shock depression/PTSD, it gives you the best feelings of an Indica dominant hybrid and yet, you get a fantastic buzz, an active buzz. I never felt sleepy.â€
â€œIts ok, yea gud one. This strain gave me the munchies big time and the high was a-freaking-mazing!!â€
